title: Missed Fasting due to Pregnancy
transcript: W mad from Pakistan says that his wife has so many days of Ramadan missed due to pregnancy uh delivery breastfeeding Etc so what's the ruling on that she has to estimate these days and she has to make up uh for these days and there's no Financial experation on her so let's assume it uh uh these days are maybe 200 days uh in total so she has to make them up to her convenience so if she fasts every Monday and Thursday and every uh three white days alhamdulillah in no time she will be uh over with it and and and there's no uh sin on her
